Safe jsonp plusins for koa.

## Install

```bash
$ npm install koa-safe-jsonp
```

## Usage

```js
var jsonp = require('koa-safe-jsonp');
var koa = require('koa');

var app = koa();
jsonp(app, {
  callback: '_callback', // default is 'callback'
  limit: 50, // max callback name string length, default is 512
});

app.use(function* () {
  this.jsonp = {foo: "bar"};
});

app.listen(1984);
```
